document.full_text: pakistan's taliban said on friday it had attacked a u.s. consulate convoy in the volatile northwestern city of peshawar, the latest assault in a surge of violence since u.s. forces killed al qaeda leader osama bin laden this month.
document.title: pakistan taliban says attacked u.s. consulate convoy
lines_and_colors: pakistan's taliban said on friday it had attacked a u.s. consulate convoy in the volatile northwestern city of peshawar, the latest assault in a surge of violence since u.s. forces killed al qaeda leader osama bin laden this month.
